title: SAP elevates Kulmeet Bawa as global chief revenue officer for biz tech platform
description: Kulmeet Bawa will continue as India head through February, during which time a new leader for SAP India will be announced, the company said in a statement.
content: German enterprise software major SAP on Friday announced the elevation of Kulmeet Bawa, president and managing director â€“ SAP Indian Subcontinent, to the global role of chief revenue officer for the company's business technology platform.
cleaned_content: german enterprise software major sap on friday announced the elevation of kulmeet bawa president and managing director sap indian subcontinent to the global role of chief revenue officer for the companys business technology platform
